article_title: Ted Cruz Looks to Poke Holes in Donald Trump’s Record on Conservative Issues
article_text:
SENECA, S.C.—Republican candidate Ted Cruz questioned rival Donald Trump’s donations to Democrats, support of Planned Parenthood and past support for abortion rights Wednesday, in an effort to dent the billionaire businessman’s support among South Carolina’s evangelical conservatives.

At a news conference just three days before the critical South Carolina Republican primary, the Texas senator said Mr. Trump bore responsibility for...
